info.about: Spru Products is one of the reliable Manufacturers, Exporters, and Suppliers of many items. We are an ISO 9001-2008 certified company. Our product range comprises of House Cleaning Chemicals, Autocare Products, and Laundry Products. We deliver good quality products at low cost. That is why our customers trust us and this helps us to create a long-term relationship with our customers.
info.address: 1st Floor, Ories Tower Plot No.- 6, Opp. New High Court Faizabad Road, Lucknow

welcomeCard.title: Manufacturing
welcomeCard.content: Our Manufacturing facilities are located at Nawabganj, Barabanki, Uttar Pradesh.

welcomeCard.title: Market Presence
welcomeCard.content: We support the on-field sales team through round-the-clock Marketing and Technical support.

welcomeCard.title: R & D
welcomeCard.content: We have a team of consultants who specialize in various products of the Industry.

welcomeCard.title: Contact
welcomeCard.content: Please feel free to communicate with us 24/7.

testCard.name: Hament Gupta
testCard.message: I am very happy with Spru Products, they are very friendly    and always ready to take new challenge . We closed several great clients  in Utter Pradesh as well India also.

testCard.name: Dinesh Jaiswal
testCard.message: I am totally surprise with quality, Amazing Products with best quality. SYFO Toilet Cleaner is superb ... Well Done Spru!

testCard.name: Anil Kumar Mathur
testCard.message: Kitchen Product range is quite impressive. It will be good option for hotel industry. Highly Recommended..

sections.heading: Our Manufacturing Unit
sections.para: We have a huge and well-structured manufacturing unit, which helps us in completing the tasks of producing Eco Series House Cleaning Produccts and chemicals within a stipulated timeframe. It is equipped with technologically advanced machinery that are upgraded as per latest industrial trends.

sections.heading: Our Warehousing Structure
sections.para: We have a huge warehousing structure that helps us in storing the toilet cleaners safely until they are approved for transportation to our customers. Our warehouse keepers maintain a suitable temperature at our warehouse.

sections.heading: Why Choose Us?
sections.para: Customers have trusted us with our products owing to the high quality of the products. Some major factors behind our success are: Eco Friendly Products • Wide distribution network • Capacious warehouse • Competitive prices • Well-structured infrastructure

sections.heading: Trust
sections.para: We are honest and direct in our dealings and always act with transparency. We say what we mean, mean what we say and always keep our promises. Trust is at the very core of everything we do. If people trust us, they want to be associated with us. It is that simple.

sections.heading: Respect
sections.para: We respect our team members, stakeholders, heritage and universe. Because it is a shared journey, we always seek a win-win outcome.

sections.heading: Commitment
sections.para: We are committed to being sustainable over long term through focus and depth in everything we do.

sections.heading: Courage
sections.para: We want to surround ourselves with bold thinkers and to always act with conviction.

sections.heading: Humility
sections.para: We endeavor to keep learning and letting our actions speak louder than our words. We also appreciate that everyone we interact with has a contribution to make to our well-being.

sections.heading: VISION
sections.para: To make every Indian household daily user of SYFO

sections.heading: MISSION
sections.para: To create a place for SYFO in Indian House Cleaning Products and hygiene solution

sections.heading: VALUES
sections.para: The SYFO Family culture guided by our vision statement. We believe in making the wellbeing and satisfaction of our customers the basis of every decision for the business and the product. The quality of our products and the loyalty of our customers are a testimony to the above statement.
